Learn to quickly generate ENTIRE features with o1 as an AI architect, and deepseek as the editor, this deep dive reveals the secrets. Whether youâ€™re an IndyDevDan follower, a fan of ai agents, or just exploring a more agentic software development style, the future is moving closer every day. With o1 and o3 coming, the question isn't what can the model do. The question is what can we do given our abilities, principles and tools.

Stay focused and keep building.
